name: Department of Fire Deferral
description:
Run around trying to prevent burn-downs. Which will get harder and harder. Controls WASD or arrow keys (tank controls).

Don't like this map? Press refresh! Procedural generation :-)

(Only) When moving, water spews forth from your fire-engine. There are power-ups to (temporarily) widen the angle or lengthen the reach. (Those won't respawn.)

You lose when the burn percentage is > 50. Try to get the best time.

Space-bar toggles an accessibility-mode.

Burns: Grass, Wall, Bridge (will fall into water)
Won't burn: Water, Road (it will look worse though), (Complete) Rubble (is already burned).
Drive: Grass, Road, Bridge, Rubble
Can't drive through: Wall, Water
